headline.main: Trailer: ‘Soul Boys of the Western World’

docs.snippet: Spandau Ballet was one of the most iconic bands in the 1980s. Here, we hear the story of a group of working-class London lads who created a global music Empire, but at a price none of them imagined....
docs.lead_paragraph: Spandau Ballet was one of the most iconic bands in the 1980s. Here, we hear the story of a group of working-class London lads who created a global music Empire, but at a price none of them imagined.

headline.main: Jailed Venezuelan Mayor Transferred From Prison to Hospital
headline.print_headline: Jailed Venezuelan Mayor Transferred From Prison to Hospital

docs.snippet: The jailed mayor of Venezuela's capital has been taken from prison to a hospital where he will undergo emergency surgery for a groin hernia....
docs.lead_paragraph: The jailed mayor of Venezuela's capital has been taken from prison to a hospital where he will undergo emergency surgery for a groin hernia.

headline.main: Another Condemned Ala Inmate Claiming Innocence
headline.print_headline: Another Condemned Ala Inmate Claiming Innocence

docs.snippet: Anthony Ray Hinton, who spent 28 years on Alabama's death row for two murders despite his claims of innocence, walked free earlier this month after prosecutors admitted they couldn't prove his guilt....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anthony Ray Hinton, who spent 28 years on Alabama's death row for two murders despite his claims of innocence, walked free earlier this month after prosecutors admitted they couldn't prove his guilt.

headline.main: How London Man May Have Helped Trigger the 'Flash Crash'
headline.print_headline: How London Man May Have Helped Trigger the 'Flash Crash'

docs.snippet: He operated from a modest suburban London home he shared with his parents, far from the city's glamorous financial center. He used off-the-shelf software anyone can buy....

headline.main: Nishikori to Play Andujar in Barcelona Open Final

headline.main: Islamic State Claims Iraqi-Jordanian Border Crossing Attack: SITE
headline.print_headline: Islamic State Claims Iraqi-Jordanian Border Crossing Attack: SITE

docs.snippet: Islamic State claimed responsibility for an attack by Belgian, French and Senegalese suicide bombers on an Iraqi border crossing with Jordan on Saturday, according to the U.S.-based SITE monitoring service....
docs.lead_paragraph: Islamic State claimed responsibility for an attack by Belgian, French and Senegalese suicide bombers on an Iraqi border crossing with Jordan on Saturday, according to the U.S.-based SITE monitoring service.

headline.main: Frenchman's Execution in Indonesia May Be Suspended
headline.print_headline: Frenchman's Execution in Indonesia May Be Suspended

docs.snippet: France is stepping up efforts to save the life a Frenchman facing a firing squad in Indonesia on drug charges, amid signs that his execution may be suspended....
docs.lead_paragraph: France is stepping up efforts to save the life a Frenchman facing a firing squad in Indonesia on drug charges, amid signs that his execution may be suspended.

headline.main: Man Who Shot Himself Outside Courthouse During Sex Case Dies
headline.print_headline: Man Who Shot Himself Outside Courthouse During Sex Case Dies

docs.snippet: Authorities say a New Hampshire man has died after shooting himself in the courthouse parking lot while awaiting a jury's verdict on charges he sexually assaulted a piano student more than a decade ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities say a New Hampshire man has died after shooting himself in the courthouse parking lot while awaiting a jury's verdict on charges he sexually assaulted a piano student more than a decade ago.

headline.main: Jordan Increases Security at Border Crossing With Iraq After Car Bombs: Official
headline.print_headline: Jordan Increases Security at Border Crossing With Iraq After Car Bombs: Official

docs.snippet: Jordan increased security at its border crossing with Iraq on Saturday after three suicide car bombs exploded on the Iraqi side, an official source said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jordan increased security at its border crossing with Iraq on Saturday after three suicide car bombs exploded on the Iraqi side, an official source said.
